summary: This mod does change the appearance of the dungeons in Skyrim. It adds new high resolution textures to many surfaces, giving the locations a more detailed and realistic look.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1399675922.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1402937388.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1402937257.jpg[/img]

[center]
[youtube]Ms-PNVgsslw#t[/youtube]
Thanks to [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=watch]hodilton[/url] for making this comparison video of the preview version.[/center]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1406202067.jpg[/img]

This mod is a part of the Beauty of Skyrim Mod Series and does change the appearance of the dungeons in Skyrim. It adds new high resolution textures to many surfaces, giving the locations a more detailed and realistic look.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1406202108.jpg[/img]

Unzip the archive and extract the files into your Skyrim/Data directory.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1406202146.jpg[/img]

This mod is not compatible with other mods that change dungeon textures.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1407866205.jpg[/img]

Q: Why do some textures still have the vanilla style?
A: I decided to keep a few textures untouched, since I am quite satisfied with their vanilla look.
However, I might replace them with HD versions in the future.
Q: What are the hardware requirements to use this mod.
A: You should have at least 4 GB of system memory and 1 GB vram.
Q: How the comparison screenshots were made?
A: The comparison screenshots were taken with the default settings and without any ENB preset. All other screenshots use ENB presets. The Bethesda HighRes DLC was always activated.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1407866285.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30631]The Beauty of Skyrim - Caves and Mines[/url] adds new high resolution textures to the caves and mines of Skyrim.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14227]Ruins Clutter Improved[/url] adds new high-res textures to common clutter objects in nordic ruins.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29608]Detailed Rugs[/url] adds new lore-friendly high-res textures to the rugs of Skyrim.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83068?]Dawnguard Fortress Improved[/url] adds new high-res textures and improved meshes to the Dawnguard Fortress.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1407866337.jpg[/img]

Base textures were used from [url=http://www.cgtextures.com]www.cgtextures.com[/url].
Thanks to Bethesda and the Skyrim Nexus community.
author: raiserfx
